title: Be My Baby
lyrics:
[Intro]
(C)(C)

[Verse 1]
(C)The night we met I knew I (Dm)needed you (G)so
(C)And if I had the chance I'd (Dm)never let you (G)go
(E7)So won't you say you love me
(A7)I'll make you so proud of me
(D7)We'll make 'em turn their heads
(G7)Every place we go

[Chorus]
So won't you (C)please (Be my, be my baby)
Be my little (Am)baby (My one and only baby)
Say you'll be my (F)darling (Be my, be my baby)
Be my baby (G)now (My one and only baby) 
Ooh, ohh, ohh, oh

[Verse 2]
(C)I'll make you happy baby, (Dm)just wait and (G)see
(C)For every kiss you give me (Dm)I'll give you (G)three
(E7)Oh, since the day I saw you
(A7)I have been waiting for you
(D7)You know I will adore you
(G7)Till eternity

[Chorus]
So won't you (C)please (Be my, be my baby)
Be my little (Am)baby (My one and only baby)
Say you'll be my (F)darling (Be my, be my baby)
Be my baby (G)now (My one and only baby) 
Ooh, ohh, ohh, oh

[Instrumental, same as the verse] 
(C)(C)(Dm)(G)
(C)(C)(Dm)(G)

[Chorus]
So come on and (C)please (Be my, be my baby)
Be my little (Am)baby (My one and only baby)
Say you'll be my (F)darling (Be my, be my baby)
Be my baby (G)now (My one and only baby) 
Ooh, ohh, ohh, oh

[Chorus â€“ last time]
Oh won't you (C)please (Be my, be my baby)
Be my little (Am)baby (My one and only baby)
Say you'll be my (F)darling (Be my, be my baby)
Be my baby (G)now (My one and only baby) 
Ooh, ohh, ohh, oh
(C tremelo) [End]
